name: DS9 Sim (WIP)
description:
Hi there! I'm in the process of making a Star Trek: Deep Space 9 visual novel/dating sim where you can flirt with all your favorite characters and take part in a dramatic plot and possibly fall in love.

This is still a Very Very early work in progress and made more for fun than anything else but I hopefully will continue to work on it and refine it. So possible grammar errors, misspellings, and low resolution or missing assets ahoy!

Any feedback on any of the writing (making it more in character or staying with an exaggerated silly tone for example) or tips on coding choice mechanics is appreciated!

Anyway, have fun with the silly work I have so far and hopefully I can put the rest of the game together.
